title: Thick Serif (Similar to Lydian)
content:
Quite similar to Lydian / Christiana.

Used by:  
"Traven T. Croves"

More examples can be found if needed...

Thanks.

comments.content: seems vaguely Friz Quadrata-ish as well.
Awesome. How'd ya manage that one?
used identifont and searched similar to Friz Quadrata which I thought was sortof right.

And, surprisingly, some folks around here who have been members for more tha two weeks actually KNOW Albertus just by seeing it; however, some of us aren’t cantankerous old farts who think (quite reasonably) that they know it all. Props, Jodie: you got the job done…
